nodes.bodyText: I probably should've done it on this PR, but I don't know how to run this code  (the div .behavior-loading element).
I would bet the people page has it. Or top level build history. I can confirm later though
Is this related to fonts changes?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -29,7 +29,6 @@ THE SOFTWARE.
 <j:jelly xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:st="jelly:stapler" xmlns:d="jelly:define" xmlns:l="/lib/layout" xmlns:t="/lib/hudson" xmlns:f="/lib/form">
 <l:layout title="${%Manage Jenkins}" permissions="${app.MANAGE_AND_SYSTEM_READ}">
   <l:header>
-     <link rel="stylesheet" href="${resURL}/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css" type="text/css" />

nodes.bodyText: Yep, bootstrap 3 was not actually being used and it has risks of messing with default font settings.

nodes.bodyText: Why are these repeated and empty?
I guess they were a placeholder for responsive typography, that I didn't do in the end. I'll remove them.
